key_responsibilities: representing the Member of Congress in the community
serving as a liaison with federal and local agencies
requirements: ability to work quickly in a high pressure environment
availability to work evenings and/or weekend hours

office: Active, hard-working Democratic member of Illinois congressional delegation
key_responsibilities: working closely with legislative and district staff
maintaining relationships with national, Chicago, and local reporters
writing talking points and press releases
producing videos and social media content
planning and promoting press events in DC and the district
requirements: previous communications and/or Capitol Hill experience
strong writing and oral communication skills
ability to multitask and prioritize under pressure

key_responsibilities: providing leadership to and managing a team
staffing the Member on issue-related events
requirements: significant Hill, political, and management experience
strong understanding of legislative procedure and policy
knowledge of critical issues under the jurisdiction of the House Judiciary and Transportation and Infrastructure Committees
excellent oral and written communication skills
ability to handle multiple, complex, and competing tasks

office: Office of U.S. Congresswoman Katie Porter
key_responsibilities: drafting statements, releases, social media copy, and advisories
assisting the Member and staff as needed
requirements: ability to handle multiple tasks and deadlines under pressure

office: Active, hard-working Member of House Leadership

maintaining relationships with national and local reporters
writing talking points and press releases
producing videos and social media content
planning and pitching press events in DC and the district
requirements: strong writing and oral communication skills

key_responsibilities: drafting social media posts and statements
requirements: strong written and verbal communication skills
proficiency in digital graphic design and editing programs
experience creating ads in social media platforms

key_responsibilities: acting as the representative for the Member
serving as a liaison with federal, district, and local agencies
requirements: strong written and verbal communication skills in English and a second language
fluency in Spanish, Farsi, Mandarin, or Korean (preferred)

comfortable documenting casework progression in a database
minimum of 3-5 years of case work experience
